summary.span: 指示用于根设计器对象的基序列化程序。

span.span: Indicates the base serializer to use for a root designer object.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示序列化管理器序列化设计文档时要使用的序列化程序，以及指定的序列化程序是否支持自动重新加载设计文档，而无需首次完全释放文档。 indicates the serializer to use when the serialization manager serializes the design document, and whether the specified serializer supports automatic reloading of the design document without first completely disposing of the document. 此属性包含以下重要成员：This attribute contains the following significant members: - 指示在设计时要使用哪种序列化对象来序列化类。 indicates what serialization object to use to serialize the class at design time. - 指示序列化对象的基类型的完全限定名称。 indicates the fully qualified name of the serialization object's base type. - 指示序列化程序是否支持在没有用户交互的情况下重新加载设计文档以打开新的设计器视图。 indicates whether the serializer supports reloading a design document without user interaction to open a new designer view. ## Examples 下面的示例代码将应用于 组件。The following example code applies a to a component. [!code-cpp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CPP/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/CS/idesignerserializationmanagersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerSerializationManagerSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerSerializationManagerSample/VB/idesignerserializationmanagersample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示根序列化程序是否支持在不首先释放设计器宿主的条件下即可重新加载设计文档。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the root serializer supports reloading of the design document without first disposing the designer host.

value.span: 如果根序列化程序支持重新加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the root serializer supports reloading; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则设计文档不会自动代表用户执行重载。If this property is set to `false`, the design document does not automatically perform a reload on behalf of the user. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则当需要更新或重新加载时，用户将负责重新打开设计文档的设计器视图窗口。If this property is set to `false`, it is the user's responsibility to reopen the designer view window for the design document, if an update or reload is desired. 某些序列化程序需要设计器加载过程中的外部组件进行交互才能重新生成设计文档。Some serializers require the interaction of external components in the designer loading process in order to rebuild the design document. 每次加载设计文档时，这些序列化程序有时都需要创建新的设计器宿主。These serializers sometimes need to create a new designer host each time the design document is loaded. 如果出现这种情况，则 将设置为 `false` ，并且在释放设计文档后，用户交互 (启动文档) 设计器时，必须重新创建设计器宿主。If this is the situation, will be set to `false`, and the designer host must be recreated by user interaction (launching the designer for the document) after the design document is disposed. 除了通过反序列化以外，连接到设计器宿主的事件和服务也不会保留，并且可能需要再次设置。The events and services that were connected to the designer host, except through deserialization, do not remain and may need to be set again. 如果 为 `true` ，则可以在设计器外对代码进行更改后重新加载设计文档，而无需关闭设计器窗口并重新打开它。If is `true`, the design document can be reloaded after changes outside the designer are made to the code, without closing the designer window and reopening it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选算法使用此属性来识别两个类型相同的特性。This property is used by filtering algorithms to identify two attributes that are the same type. 对于大多数属性，这只是返回 特性的实例。For most attributes, this just returns the instance for the attribute. 重写此以包含编辑器基类型的类型。 overrides this to include the type of the editor base type.
